ABAMMEGANYI be ssaza lya Butambala bamaze okutendekebwa ne bawera okumegga amasaza amalala gonna nti kuba bayungudde ba musaayi muto bokka.
Okusinziira ku mutendesi wâ€™omuzannyo gwe kigo ggumbya ekya Bukedde Saadi Ssebalemba ategeezezza nti abazannyibe bonna beetegese bulungi era nti bakomekkereza okutendekebwa basobole okufuna akaseera k'okuwummula batuuke ku ssande nga bali kawerette.
Ayongeddeko nti mu tiimu ye yonna temuli muntu ali waggulu wa myaka asatu era nti akimanyi bulungi nti tebayinza butawangula kyapa kuba bonna bamusaayi muto.
Tumaze emyazi nga tutendekebwa obukodyo obw'enjawulo okwo gattako okulya obulungi ng'ate tetukozesa bintu byonna bitamiiza era sisuubirayo muntu ayinza kumegga baana bange kuba obukodyo bwonna nabubamaliddeyo bwatyo SSebalemba bwategezeza.
Wabula kyensaba banna Butambala kwekujjumbira okugenda e Mpigi ku kisaawe batuwagire abamegganyi baffe basobole okuddamu amaanyi agamegga amasaza gonna getugenda okuttunka nago.
Empaka zâ€™ekigwo ggumbya zigenda kubeera mu kisaawe e Mpigi ku sande eno nga 21 era nga zakwetabwamu amasaza ataano okuli essaza lya Mawokota,Butambala,Gomba,Ssese ne Kyadondo era anaaziwangula wakutwala ekyapa n'ebirabo ebirala bingi.

NAKIFUMA
Kyadaaki eddwaliro lya Kikube Health Centre II eritalina kaabuyonjo ku kyalo Kakuukuulu mu ggombolola yâ€™e Kasawo lifunye alijuna.
Omubaka wa Nakifuma, Fred Ssimbwa Kaggwa yâ€™alitaddemu ssente okulidabiliza. Lino lisangiddwa nga terilina kaabuyonjo, litonya, edagala temuli nga nâ€™ebitanda mulimu bibiri(2) byokka. Kyategerekese nti abasawo nâ€™abalwadde okwetewuluza badukira ku ssomero eririnaanyewo.
Ngâ€™ali ne Hanifa Nabukeera omubaka omukya owa Mukono disitulikiti, Ssimbwa yategeezezza abatuuze nga bwagenda okulidabiliza era wa kulibakwasa ku lunaku lwa Bamaama, May 8. Mathias Mpuuga akulira oludda oluvuganya mu paliyamenti yagenda okubeera omugenyi omukulu.

Omusumba wa Life Christian Church Jackson Ssenyonga akungubagidde omugenzi Paasita Augustine Yiga eyavude mu bulamu bw'ensi eno olunaku olwaleero kyokka n'asaba abantu bulijjo okulekanga omukululo omulungi .
Wabula Ssenyonga talina kalungi k'ayogedde ku mugenzi n'agamba nti afudde talokose yadde nga ku ssaawa esembayo agezezzaako nnyo okumutuukirira alokoke kyokka ne birema .
Ayogedde ku mugenzi nga abadde nabbi ow'obulimba , omukabassanyi w'abakazi era nga waafiiridde abadde awerebye endiga ze nnyingi ekirwadde kya kiryatabaala nga kw'otadde n'okwegaana abaana baazadde mw'abo baakaka omukwano.
Ssenyonga akoowode abo bonna omugenzi be yazaalamu kyokka n'agaana okubalabirira okuggya gy'ali abawe obuyambi wamu n'okuweerera abaana baabwe.
Ssenyonga agabidde abaamawulire obutambi bwa CD obwoleka ebikolobero omugenzi by'azze akola.
Bya Jaliat Namuwaya

Makerere University wamu ne Universities endala zisabiddwa okwetaba obutereevu mu kulwanirira nâ€™okulambika ku nsonga zâ€™ eddembe lyâ€™obuntu mu ggwanga okusinga okuzirekera bannabyabufuzi nâ€™ebitongole byanakyeewa
Bino bibadde mu kutongoza alipoota eyokuna eyâ€™akakiiko kâ€™eddembe lyâ€™obuntu mu Wakiso district eya 2023, ku mukolo ogubadde ku Makerere University School of Vetenary Medicine.
Alipoota yâ€™omulundi guno ebadde ku mulamwa ogwâ€™okwongera amaanyi mu ddembe lyâ€™bulamu , obuweereza mu bantu wamu nâ€™e
... 
ubeera mu bizibu ebitaggwa gemattendekero nga Makerere University okutandika okwesamba ensonga ezikwata kubulamu bwantu .
Principal wa Makerere school of Vetenary Medicine prof Mwiine Frank ategeezezza kati bwebagenda okufuba okulaba nga ssetendekero wa Makerere yenyigira butereevu kukulambika ku nsonga ezinyigiriza omuntu wabulijjo, naddala okulwanirira obutonde bwensi nga wano bakutuukira ddala kubuli muntu avunanyizibwa.
Bonabye Kamaadi director avunanyizibwa ku nsonga zâ€™okunonyereza mu kiton
...
 ezâ€™ebitundu okulaba nga district zonna zitekesa mu nkola obukiiko obuvunayizibwa ku ddembe lyâ€™obuntu nga district ye Wakiso bwekola.
Ssentebe wâ€™akakiiko kâ€™eddembe lyâ€™obuntu mu Wakiso Elly Kasirye agamba nti alipoota yâ€™omulundi guno essira balitadde nnyo kubyobulamu kubanga bakizudde nti amalwaliro agasinga gali mu mbeera mb.
Agambye nti waliwo nagamu ku malwaliro gebasanze nga gaazimbibwa nga tegaliko bifo byanguyizaako abantu abaliko obulemu okufuna obuweereza obulungi.
Bisakiddwa: Tonny Ngabo

Robert Kyagulanyi Sentamu (Bobi Wine) yalaalise nga bw'atagenda kukkiriza bya butakuba nkuhhaana kubanga akakiiko k'ebyokulonda bwe kaabadde kabisalawo keebuuzizza ku muntu omu Pulezidenti Museveni ate nga naye asuubirwa okuvuganya ku kifo kye kimu ekya Pulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021.
Yagambye nti okukuba enkuhhaana mu kunoonya akalulu k'Obwapulezidenti kiri mu mateeka era bw'anaaba azikubye ajja kuba atambulidde mu Ssemateeka ky'alagira.
Bino Bobi Wine yabyogedde eggulo mu lukuhhaana lwa bannama
... 
 bwa Corona okwanjula entegeka eyamba ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza wabula bino abakulembeze ba NRM baabisambazze ne bategeeza nti okukulembeza akalulu n'oleka obulamu bw'abantu mu katyabaga, tebuba bukulembeze bulungi.
Wiiki ewedde Minisita w'ebyamawulire, Judith Nabakooba yalabudde abantu obuteetaba mu kampeyini ya kukuba buseppiki eyalangirirwa Bobi Wine ne Dr. Kizza Besigye ng'agamba nti obulwadde bwa Corona busobola okubakwata nga beekalakaasa.
Bobi Wine mu kwogera yagambye nti: Amerika yaakafi
...
, Jotham Taremwa yagambye nti bye baalangirira byonna biri mu mateeka agabawa obuyinza okutegeka okulonda mu mbeera ekusobozesa okubeerawo ne kuggwa mirembe n'agamba nti ofiisi zaabwe nzigule okuwuliriza ebirowoozo by'abategeka okuvuganya n'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebirala; n'agattako nti atakkaanya n'ekyo asobola okukozesa ekkubo lya kkooti.
Bobi Wine yakkaatirizza nga bw'agenda okwesimbawo avuganye Pulezidenti Museveni mu kulonda okujja n'agamba nti nga People Power tebagenda kuzira kalulu kano.

Olwali olwo omukazi munnabyabufuzi Miria Matembe nâ€™ateesa mu Palamenti ngâ€™agamba nti abasajja abakwata abakazi okunyumya akaboozi olwâ€™empaka, balaayibwenga bulaayibwa olwâ€™okubamala emmya.
Babaka banne bamwanukula mangu nti ekyâ€™okulaawa abasajja si kituufu kubanga kirinnyirira eddembe lyabwe eryâ€™obuntu.
Naye ate kati kirabika ngâ€™ekiseera kituuse okusalawo kiki ekiyinza okukolebwa abasajja abeeyambisa obubi eddembe lyâ€™obuntu ne bafutyanka eddembe lyâ€™abalala.
Gamba nga musajjamukulu Matovu owâ€™e Kalagala mu disitulikiti yâ€™e Luweero aweza emyaka 65 egyâ€™obukulu, eyakoze ebikolobero ku kawala ke kâ€™azaalira ddala akâ€™emyaka 13 nâ€™akakwata nâ€™akakavvula.
Akaana kano abâ€™ekyalo baakasanze mu kifulukwa nga gye keekwese, era nga kagamba nti kadduka mu maka ga kitaawe waako kubanga taata waako abadde akeefuukira nâ€™akakwata nâ€™akabonyaabonya.
Taata ono bwe yakwatiddwa yakikkiriza bulambalamba nti abadde akwata akaana ke ako nâ€™akakavvula.
Yagambye nti kyokka akaana ke kaamuyisa obubi, kubanga olumu kaayambala akateteeyi akampi ne katuula mu ntebe ye ne kamusaaliza era kwe kukakwata!
Mu ngeri eyo ebyâ€™ekivve ngâ€™ebyo Bamatovu bakaggwensonyi bye bakola ne ku baana baabwe amabujje be bazaala, tekyebeereka nakatono okuddamu okulowooza ku kiteeso kya Miria Matembe ekyâ€™okulaawa abagwagwa abo.
Bwe balaayibwa balaayibwe ggwe kale balina kukolerwa ki? Kubanga mazima yo ensi egudde eddalu ate egwiridde ddala addalu ekkankada. Sikulimba.

Bya Mike Sebalu. Ababaka ba Parliament okuva mu bitundu bya West Nile baagala gavumenti okwaguyako okuyunga ekitundu kyabwe ku masanyalaze gâ€™eggwanga, abantu bebakulembera basobole okwenyigira mu milimu egivaamu ensimbi nâ€™okugatta ettofaali ku nkulakulana yâ€™eggwanga.

bakaka abava mu kitundu kino ogwa West Nile Parliamentary Caucus era nga ye mubaka wa Ora County mu Parliament Biyika Lawrence Songa agamba nti mu bisuubizo ebyalema okutuukirizibwa mwemuli nâ€™amakubo.
Omukulembeze wâ€™eggwanga okulambula kwe agenda kutandikira mu kibuga Arua era nga ajja kutuukako ne mu bitundu byâ€™e Obongi gyâ€™asuubirwa okworezeganya nâ€™abantu baayo mu bitundu ebye Madi.

ga kigenderere.

Abayeekera ba Uganda nga bayambibwako eggye kyâ€™eggwanga lya Tanzania, bawamba ekibuga Kampala nga 11/04/1979 era bwebatyo nebamaamulako President Amin eyaliko mu kiseera ekyo.
Oluvanyuma lwâ€™okuwamba, Amin yawangangukira mu gwanga lya Libya ate eyo gyeyava neyeyongerayo e Iraq er oluvanyuma nafiira e Saudi Arabia mu mwaka ogwa 2003.

Ennongoosereza zino zikirambika nti kigenda kubeera kya buwaze omukozesa yenna okusasulira omukozi we ssente z'alina okutereka bw'alemwa ekibonerezo bakyongedde okukikalubya.
Etteeka eririwo kirambika nti omukozi aggyibwako ebitundu 5 ku 100 ku musaala gwe olwo omukozesa n'amwongerezaako ebitundu 10 ku 100 n'azimuterekera mu NSSF.
Kyokka ssente ezo zibadde ziggyibwako omusolo naye mu nnongoosereza ereeteddwa tebaggya kuziggyako musolo.
Akulira NSSF, Richard Byarugaba ng'ali n'omukungu wa Gavunen
... 
ekitongole ku ssente z'abakozi kyokka ennongoosereza zikkiriza Gavumenti okuzeewola ng'egoberera amateeka.
Ebitundu 10 ku 100 omukozesa z'aterekerayo omukozi zibadde teziggyibwako musolo naye mu nnongoosereza tekirambuluddwa oba zinaggyibwako era wano Byarugaba yategeezezza nti baakugenda mu Palamenti bakittaanye.
Ennongoosereza zirambika nti, omuntu alina ssente mu NSSF asobola okuziggyayo ku myaka 55 kyokka ku myaka gino amagoba ge zikoze gaggyibwako omusolo naye singa agumiikiriza n'aziggyayo
...
nongoosereza ezikolebwa ajja kubeeranga wa ddembe okusalawo okweterekerayo ssente endala mu ngeri ya kyeyagalire.
Wano Byarugaba weyasinzidde n'ategeeza nti okunoonyereza kulaga nti Bannayuganda ebitundu 93 ku 100 batuuka okuwummula nga tebawezaayo bukadde 50 mu NSSF newankubadde ng'abasinga abeera aterese okumala emyaka 25 .
Kkyokka akasente ke bafuna okuva mu NSSF bakakozesa mu bbanga lya mwaka gumu nga tebakyalinawo wadde omunwe gw'ennusu ate nga tebalina kintu kye bazikozeemu ekizza amagoba.

Abakukusa ebiragalalagala nâ€™ababiguza abaana bâ€™amassomero baakusibwa mayisa mu nkomyo, okusinziira ku bibonerezo ebiteereddwa mu bbago lyâ€™etteeka eryanjuddwa mu parliament okulwanyisa ebiragalalagala erya Narcotics drugs and psychotropic substance control bill.
Etteeka lino wiiki 2 eziyise ,kkooti yalisazaamu bweyakizuula nti parliament bweyali eriyisa mu mwaka 2016, teyalina muwendo gwassalira ogwâ€™ababaka
Ababaka 2 Asuman Basaalirwa owa Bugiri municipality ne Christopher Komakech owa Aruu bebaabadde bawomye omutwe mu kuddamu okwanjula etteeka lino.
Christopher Komakech agambye nti abaana bangi boononese olwâ€™ebiragalalagala.
Wabula ssaabawolereza wa government Kiryowa Kiwanuka ategezezza sipiika wa parliament nti government eddizibwe obuvunaanyizibwa obuddamu okwekennenya nâ€™okubaga etteeka eryo, oluvannyuma eryanjule mu parliament.
Sipiika Anitah Annet Among yakkiriza era nâ€™abalagira obutasukka Thursday ya wiiki eno, okuba nga government ezzeemu okwanjula etteeka lino erikwata kukulwanyisa ebiragalalagala.#

Omuntu omu atanategeerekeka mannya eyakedde okusaabalila ku mmeeri eya MV Kalangala ebadde eva e Kalangala okudda e Entebbe yesudde mu mazzi naaffa.
Omuvubuka ono ateberezebwa okutemera mu myaka egyâ€™obukulu 30 yasoose kutegeeza basabazze banne nga bwatabadde na nsimbi zakusasula mmeeri ebadde edda Entebbe, wabula babadde banaatera okutuuka neyesuula mu nnyanja.
Omugoba wâ€™emmeeri Cornely Mujahuzi Agamba nti bagezezaako okumutaasa wabula tekisobose.
Mujahuzi agambye nti bategezezza Police ye Nakiwogo neggulawo file era baleseeyo essimu nâ€™akasawo byalese ku mmeeri.
Guno gwe mulundi ogwokubili omusabazze okubuuka ku mmeeri ya MV Kalangala neyesuula mu nnyanja, ngâ€™eyasooka yasuulamu mu mwaka gwa 2021 era yaleka ategeeza basaabazze banne nti yali akoonye ensi.
Bisakiddwa: David Ssekayinga

Cecilia Barbara Atim Ogwal afudde enkya ya leero.
Ogwal afiiridde ku myaka 77.
Amawulire agava mu famire galaga nti Ogwal afiiridde mu ggwanga lya India ngâ€™abadde atawanyizibwa obulwadde bwa Kkansa.
Cecilia Ogwal yazaalibwa mu disitulikiti yâ€™e Dokolo nga 12, June, 1946.
Yasomera mu Uganda wabula ku myaka 21, yafuna omukisa okugenda mu University of East Africa mu Nairobi (kati emanyikiddwa nga University of Nairobi) okusoma diguli mu byâ€™obusuubuzi.
Yasomerako mu nsi endala omuli Singapore ne Australia ebintu ebyâ€™enjawulo.
Ebyobufuzi abiruddemu
- Yakolako ngâ€™omuwandiisi wâ€™ekibiina ki Uganda Peopleâ€™s Congress (UPC) okuva 1985 â€“ 1992
- Mu 1994, yali kakiiko akabaga sseemateeka wa Uganda owa 1995.
- Yali mu bifo ebyamaanyi mu UPC okutuusa mu 2004.
- Mu kulonda kwa 2006, mutabani wâ€™omugenzi Milton Obote, Jimmy Akena, yamuwangula ku kyâ€™omubaka wa Monisipaali yâ€™e Lira.
- Mu 2011, Ogwal yaddamu okuvuganya era yawangula ekyâ€™omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti yâ€™e Dokolo.
- Okuwangula, yava mu UPC okudda mu Forum for Democratic Change (FDC).
- Ogwal abadde mukyala mufumbo nâ€™abaana 7.
- Wabula mu 1969, ku myaka 23, yawangula obwa Miss Uganda.

Hafiz Bukenya okwogera bino asinzidde kumukolo gwâ€™okufumbiza Salimah Bint Hussein muwala wa Hussein Baligeya nga ono awoweddwa nemwana munne Hydary Muganzi Buyondo awangaalira e Bungereza nga mutaabani wa Hajji Muhammad Muganzi Buyondo. Wano gavumenti wesinzidde okulagira amakkampuni agaawereddwa omulimu gwâ€™okutandika okusima amafuta gatandike okutendeka Bannayuganda abagwiira baleme kubamalako mirimu.
Omwaka 2020 we gunaatuukira amakampuni agali mu byâ€™okusima, okulongoosa nâ€™okutunda amafuta gagenda kukakibwa okuitandika okukozesa Bannayuganda.
Omwogezi wa gavumenti Ofwon
... 
udde e Ntebe nga lukubirizibwa Pulezidenti Museveni.
Olukiiko lwayisizza enkola egenda okugoberera mu byâ€™okusima amafuta ngâ€™egenderera okulaba nga Bannayuganda tebalekebwa bbali mu nsonga zino.
Ofwono yategeezezza nti kizuuliddwa nti abaganyulwa mu mirimu egimu bagwiira. Nâ€™agamba nti amakkampuni gâ€™abagwiira agamu gajja nâ€™abakozi baago be bawa ensimbi zâ€™emisaala nâ€™ensako ennyingi kwe bagatta nâ€™okuleeta ebikozesebwa okuva mu mawanga gaabwe.

...
osa amafuta gagenda kukakibwa okutandika okukozesa Bannayuganda.
Uganda bwâ€™eneeba etandise okulongoosa amafuta, esuubira okutandikira ku kufulumya amafuta ga galoni emitwalo esatu buli lunaku. Kyokka ngâ€™ebipipa ebirala ebyemafuta agatali malongoose ebiwera emitwalo esatu buli lunaku bigenda kutundibwanga bweru.
Eddongoserezo lyâ€™amafuta bwe linaggwa obulungi olwo Uganda tegenda kuddamu kutunda mafuta gatali malongoose gonna bweru, ejja kuba efulumya amafuta amalongoose ga bipipa emitwalo mukaaga.

KANGAAWO
Kangaawo ye Wessaza afuga Essaza Bulemeezi.Okuva ku mulembe gwa Ssekabaka Kimera(1275-1330), okutuuka ku mulembe gwa
Ssekabaka Mawanda (1740-1760), ekitundu kya Buganda ekyayitibwanga Bulemezeezi, kyafugibwanga mu nsikirano.Omutaka
Nnaabugwamu yabuweebwa Ssekabaka kimera (1275-1330) ng'amazze okulya Obuganda.Okuva ku Kimera okutuka ku Mawanda,
Bulemeezi teryali ssaza.Nnaabugwamu yali Ssabawaali ku Kaggo.Essaza lye tuyita Bulemeezi kaakano,Nnaabugwamu yalifugangako
kapapajjo.Ekitundu ekisinga obunene Nnabugugwamu kye yafuganga kaakati kiri mu Kyaddondo.Ebyalo nga Wamirongo,Buwambo,Kkungu
ne Kasalirwe byali mu Bulemeezi nga bifugibwa Nnaabugwamu
Kangaawo oluusi ayitibwa Ssaabalemeezi.
Ennyumba ya kangaawo eyitibwa kasusse-omumiro
Enngoma ye evuga nti: "Fekka Abalemeezi, Fekka Abalemeezi".
Omugenzi Yozefu Nsingisira ye yaggya embuga ya Kangaawo ku Buzinde n'agizza Ku Waluleeta.Ate Omwami Mukasa samwili
ye yaggya embuga ya kangaawo ku Waluleeta n'agizza ku kasozi Ggaga kw'eri kaakano.Naye olwo'butasuula mannya Bbowa ne
Buzinde, embuga ya Kangaawo gye yasookera akasozi Ggaga baakaggyako erinya lyako ne bakayita Bbowa-Buzinde.
Ebigambo byo wandiise: 153

Nnaabagereka agambye nti basazeewo okulonda omulamwa guno, olwâ€™aavubuka abakozesa obubi technologiya wâ€™ebyempuliziganya okuvvoola abalala, so ng`ate basobola okumweyambisa okwekulakulanya n`okunyweza obuwangwa bwabwe.
Nnaabagere
... 
ya 2024, wamu ne Somero lya Janan School Bombo Kalule erigenda okutegeka eky`Omwaka ogujja 2025.
Minister webyenjigiriza, eby`obulamu era avunanyizibwa ku office ya Nnaabagereka Owek Cotlida Nakate Kikomeko, agambye nti ekisaakaate okuva lwekyatandikibwa kyafuuka empagi sseddugge mu kuteekateeka abaana bâ€™eggwanga.
Ssenkulu wa MTN Uganda Sylvia Mulinge, agambye nti ekisaakaate Kya Nnaabagereka kigasse etoffaali lyâ€™amaanyi mu nkuza ne nnambika y`omwana wa Uganda.
Ssenkulu wa Nnaabagereeka Developm
...
bwa ebintu byonna ebikolebwa mu Kisaakaate, wamu nâ€™okutandika ku kaweefube w`okuzimba amaka gabwe amatongole age Kisaakaate e Masuuliita.
Omutandisi wâ€™amasomero ga Janaan Schools Omukungu Micheal Kironde, agambye nti kino kitiibwa kyamanyi okuba nga bongeddwa omukisa okuddamu okutegeka ekisaakaate, baali baasemba okukitegeka mu 2017.
Agambye nti mu kisaakaate kino bagala okukwasizaako abamu ku baana abatalina busoboozi nga babasasuliira ensimbi z`okubatwala mu kisaakaate.

Omala yategeezezza Bukedde nti, lwaki balinze ngâ€™abuzaayo emyezi 10 awummule emirimu gya poliisi balyoke bafulumye ebintu ngâ€™ebyo ebitategeerekeka.
â€œBwe baba baagala kutunoonyerezaako bamanyi we batusanga bajje bakikoleâ€ Omala bwe yaggumizza mu ddoboozi ekkangufu.
Yagambye nti bye boogera wolokoso era kyâ€™atayinza kukweka kye kyâ€™okubeera nti yalangiridde dda nti agenda kuvuganya mu byobufuzi wabula mu kiseera kino akyali muserikale mu poliisi era tayinza kulaga ludda, langi wadde ekibiina kwâ€™agenda okuvuganyiza.

Gavumenti yataddewo obuwumbi bwa sente za Uganda 65 nga zino zigenda kukozesebwa okugula Kamera Zikalondoozi oba zibuli wooli nkulaba ezignda okulondoola obumenyi bwâ€™amateeka. Poliisi yeyawereddwa omulimu gwâ€™okugula Kamera zino nga kino balina okukikola ngâ€™omwaka gwâ€™ebyensimbi guno tegunaba kugwako. Moses Masiko mukugu mubyokwerinda naddala ku ludda olwa Kamera ezikozesebwa mu kulwanyisa obumenyi bwâ€™amateeka. Ono alabudde nti banauganda besunge kitono kuba bayinza obutazifunamu okujjako ngebirina okukolebwa bikoleddwa.

Chapter 1
1 Awo olwatuuka mu mwaka ogw'amakumi asatu mu mwezi ogw'okuna ku lunaku olw'omwezi olw'okutaano, bwe nnali ndi mu basibe ku mabbali g'omugga Kebali, eggulu ne libikkulibwa, ne ndaba okwolesebwa kwa Katonda.
2 Ku lunaku olw'okutaano olw'omwezi, gwe gwali omwaka ogw'okutaano ogw'okusibibwa kwa kabaka Yekoyakini,
3 ekigambo kya Mukama ne kijjirira ddala Ezeekyeri kabona mutabani wa Buuzi mu nsi ey'Abakaludaaya ku mabbali g'omugga Kebali; omukono gwa Mukama ne gubeera ku ye eyo.

...

16 Embala eya bannamuziga n'omulimu gwabwe baafaanana ebbala erya berulo: era abo abana baalina ekifaananyi kimu: n'embala yaabwe n'omulimu gwabwe byali nga nnamuziga ali wakati wa nnamuziga.

ba ng'ebbala ery'ezaabu etabuddwamu effeeza, ng'embala ey'omuliro munda mu yo enjuyi zonna, okuva ku mbala y'ekiwato kye n'okwambuka; era okuva ku mbala y'ekiwato kye n'okukka, nalaba ng'embala ey'omuliro, era waaliwo okumasamasa okumwetoolodde.
28 Ng'embala eya musoke aba ku kire ku lunaku olw'enkuba, bw'etyo bwe yali embala ey'okumasamasa enjuyi zonna. Eno ye yali embala ey'ekifaananyi eky'ekitiibwa kya Mukama. Awo bwe nnakiraba, ne nvuunama amaaso gange, ne mpulira eddoboozi ly'oyo eyayogera.

Obadde okimanyi nti osobola okufuna obukadde 22 mu myezi ena okuva mu butungulu? Okulima obutungulu bizinensi efuna ekiralu singa obulimira mu kifo ekituufu naddala mu nsozi awannyogovu, okubala sizoni n'okugula ensigo entuufu.
Yiika okugirongoosa kirungi n'okozesa tulakita kuba ettaka lyetaaga okuba nga liyiikayiika era nga ggonvu kuba emirandira gy'obutungulu minafu. Nga yiika eyinza okugirimira 150,000/-.
Weetaaga ensigo y'omulembe kkiro emu ku 750,000/- oba kakadde.
Olina okussaaamu ebigimus
... 
mu ya 250,000/- n'osaasaanya 1,750,000/-.
Eddagala; kkiro 10 eza mancozeb nga buli emu egula 13,000/- oba 14,000/-. Nga wano weetaaga 130,000/- oba 140,000/-.
Eddagala eritta ebiwuka (pesticide), kkiro ssatu buli emu ku 60,000/-. Nga wano weetaaga 120,000/-.
Eddagala eriwonya nga waliwo obulwadde (curative), kkiro bbiri buli emu ku 60,000/- nga wetaaga 120,000/-.
Ekijimusa kya NPK kkiro 80 ku 3,000/- buli emu olwo nga wetaaga 240,000/-.
Can kkiro 80 ku 3,000/- buli kkiro nga wano weetaaga 240,00
...
gulamu ttani 15-20 nga buli kkiro ya 1,500/-. Wano obeera ofuna 22,500,000 oba obukadde 30.

Ababaka ba palamenti batabuse
Ababaka ba palamenti abava ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti, abataliiko luuyi nâ€™abagobwa mu NRM basabye bannayuganda obutassa kitiibwa mu byâ€™okugoba loodimeeya.
Nga boogerako eri bannamawulire, ababaka bano bagambye nti ku lwâ€™okutaano lwa ssabiiti eno, bagenda kuwerekera loodimeeya okudda mu ofiisi ye kubanga agirimu mu mateeka.
Nampala wâ€™abavuganya omubaka Winifred Kiiza agamba nti olukiiko olwagobye Lukwago lumenya mateeka era nga ebyaluvuddemu bikyaamu Ababaka bano kubaddeko Mathias Mpuuga, Alice Alaso FDC, Dr Lulume Bayiga, Paul Mwiru Rev Jacinto Ogwal Betty Nambooze, Theodore Sekikubo ne Barnabas Tinkasimire.
Bano bagamba nti nebagenda kukkiriza muntu yenna kumenya seemateeka Bino bizze nga minista frank Tumwebaze yakamla okweddiza emirimu gya loodimeeya.

OMUMYUKA wâ€™omwogezi wa Gavumenti Col. Shaban Bantariza alabudde abakyala bâ€™e Lugazi obutalimbibwa bavubuka ku kukyusa bukulembeze nga babuggya ku Pulezidenti Museveni nâ€™agamba nti baagala kutuzza gye twava.
Yawadde abakyala amagezi nti, bwe balaba nga waliwo ebitabatuukako balonde abakulembeze be balaba nga balina obusobozi okutuuka eri omukulu alina ekyagi omuva emmere.
Col. Bantariza yabitegeezezza ebibiina byâ€™abakyala ebyasobye mu 200, abaabadde ku ssomero lya Lugazi Umea P/S mu nteekateeka yâ€™okusisinkana abakulu okuva mu Gavumenti okulaba engeri ebibiina gye bisobola okuyambibwamui okwekulaakulanya.

Bya DAVID KIBANGA
NGA Herman Wasswa yaakalemwa okufuna ttiimu emugula e Vietnam, muteebi munne mu KCC, Tony Odur yasitudde ku Lwokuna nâ€™addayo (e Vietnam) atuukirize ekirooto kyâ€™okuzannya ku mupiira ogwâ€™ensimbi.
Emu ku ttiimu zâ€™agenda okugezesebwamu ye Sai Gon FC, eyasalako Geoffrey Kizito â€˜Babaâ€™ ne Moses Oloya. Okugenda kwa Odur kulese KCC mu kattu nga kati erina omuteebi omu (Herman Wasswa) kyokka nga be bagenda okukiikirira Uganda mu Africa Champions League.
Omuwandiisi wa KCC FC, David Tamale yakakasizza okugenda kwa Odur e Vietnam bwe yagambye nti, â€œTeyatubuulidde ttiimu mwâ€™agenze naye yatusabye ne tumukkiriza.â€
tumukkirize agezese emikisa gya pulofeesono ne tumukkiriza,â€ Tamale bwe yategeezezza.
Oluzannya lwa liigi olusoka lugenze okuggwaako nga Odur yâ€™akulembedde abateebi ne ggoolo 11 nga yasembyeyo kuteeba nga bawangula URA FC (3-2) e Lugazi ku Lwokubiri.

Haugesund yamalidde mu kya 3 mu liigi ya babinywera eya Norway era esuubirwa okuzannya EUROPA omwaka ogujja.

Bya RUTH NAZZIWA

a abantu abakosebwa ebiragalalagala okuva ku Hope and Beyond Rehabilitation Centre e Lubaga agamba nti omwenge gwa bulabe nnyo era nagwo olina okugwewala oba okunywa mu bipimo ebisaanidde kuba bwâ€™oguyitiriza gwongera ku buzito bwâ€™omubiriekissa obulamu bwo mu matigga.

RDC wa Kira, Isaac Kawonawo kirabika akyamanyi okusala ddansi. Omanyi olwawulidde nti mukama we, manya Pulezidenti awangudde akalulu n'agenda ng'ayita mu bantu be abaabadde bakoze obubaga mu bitundu eby'enjawulo ajaganyize wamu nabo.
Twamuguddeko ku Don Courts e Kira ng'emiziki gimuyingidde era abaabaddewo kwe kumuwa ekyanya n'atandika okulaga ku ky'alinawo. Mu birala ebyamuleese essanyu mwe mwabadde n'abavubuka abeeyise aba FDC abaagambye nti â€˜baalokose' ne balaba omusana ne badda ku ttiimu empanguzi eya NRM.
Janet Rutaboorwa (atudde ku ddyo) gwe baakazaako erya Maama Kyama ng'ono mukubiriza okuva mu ofi isi y'obwapulezidenti ne Juliet Kaniini nabo bwe baalabye RDC Kawonawo (mu ssaati ez'ebukuubo) ng'atabukidde omuziki kwe kumuwa engalo.
RDC yalumbye ne ku Kazinga Main ne yeegatta ku baayo okwabadde Henry Kabanda (mu ssaati enzirugavu), ssentebe w'ekyalo nga naye wa Tukole Task Force ebadde enoonyeza pulezidenti akalulu ne Martin Kabanda, ssentebe wa NRM ku kyalo ne batema ddansi n'okusala keeki nga bajaguza obuwanguzi.

Bya Boniface Kizza

Amawulire
Gwebataliyirira awawabidde UNRA
Bya Ruth Anderah
Ekitongole kyebyengudo mu gwanga, Uganda National Roads Authority bakiwawabidde mu mbuga.
Waliwo omusubuzi abatutte mu mbuga ngayagala kumuliyirira obuwumbi 2 nobukadde 100 nga yoomu ku bakosebwa mu polojekiti yokukola oluguudo lwa Kira-Matugga.
Ettaka mwebayisa oluguudo lisangibwa ku block 185, plot 967 a Namugongo ku luguudo oluva e Kira okudda e Kasangati.
John Mugisha mu mpaaba gyeyatadde mu kooti enkulu etawuluza enkayana agamba nti mu ttaka lino mwalimu, ekizmbe kye ngazimba woteeri, lyetoloddwa olusozi nebintu ebirala ebyomuwendo.
Okuyita mu bannamateeka be aba Rutebemberwa and Co Advocates, agamba nti emirimu gye mingi egyagotaana, olwebintu bye byebayonoona.
Ono agamba nti nga 13 mu Decemba wa 2018, UNRA yamulagira ayimirize emirimu gye ku ttaka lino, oluvanyuma nga 26 March 2019 nabategeeza mu butongole nti lino ttaka lye songa yali akoseddwa olwemirimu gyokukola oluguudo.
Mu April wa 2019, bamubalirira, ngalina okusasulwa obuwumbi 4 nobukadde 600 ate mu Septemba nga 17 2020, UNRA baddamu nebamutegeeza nti bazeemu nebamubalirirra mu kwetegereza, ssente nebazsisala okudda ku buwumbi 2 nobukadde 800.
Kati ayagala kooti ekake UNRA, okumusasula bamuteremu nezensusuuba obukadde 21 olwokumugotaanya.

Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga akunze Obuganda okulonda abakulembeze okusinziira ku busobozi bwabwe sso si nzikiriza. Mayiga abadde ayogerako eri ababaka mu Lukiiko lwa Buganda agamba nti abantu okweyawula ku nsonga ze batalinaako buyinza, kizza ggwanga mabega.Okwawukanako nâ€™entuula zâ€™olukiiko endala, ku mulundi guno, ababaka batudde ku Buganda Royal Institute e Mmengo olwâ€™ensonga za COVID-19.

EGGULO ku Lwokutaano, Winnie Nannyondo ne Halima Nakayi baayiseewo okwesogga semi mu mita 800 mu misinde gy'ensi yonna egya IAAF World Championship egiyindira mu kibuga Doha ekya Qatar.
Leero ku Lwomukaaga ku ssaawa 3:55 ez'ekiro, baakudda mu nsiike okulaba nga beesogga fayinolo.
Nakayi, yeesigamye ku mutindo gwe yassizzaawo mu mizannyo gya Afrika mwe yawangulidde omudaali ogw'ekikomo okulaba ng'ava e Doha ng'alina omudaali.
Mu mutendera mwe yaddukidde mu z'okusunsulamu ezaasoose, Nanyondo ye yakulembedde banne nga mita 800 yazidukidde mu ddakiika 2:01.19. Ajjukirwa mu mizannyo gya Commonwealth bwe yawangula omudaali gw'ekikomo era aluubirira okutuuka ku fayinolo asobole okuwangula omudaali.

Bannabyabufuzi beebuuza obuvumu Gavt gyebujja okusenza bannansi ba Afghanstan
Bannabyabufuzi batandise okusoya gavt ya NRM ebibuuzo ebyekuusa kukukuuma eddembe lyobuntu eryooke ebudamye bannansi ba afghanstan abadduse obukambwe bwa Bataliban.
Okusinzira ku senkagale we kibiina kye byobufuzi ekya Alliance for National Transformation (ANT) Rtd Maj. Gen Mugisha Muntu, bannansi ba Afghan bali mukudduka ebikolwa ebyokutyoboola eddembe lyobuntu oluvanyuma lwa bateliban okuwamba obuyinza kyokka ne mu Uganda gye baddukidde ebikolwa bino gyebiri.
Alipoota ezÃ©njawulo ezize zikolebwa akakiiko akalwanirira eddembe lyobuntu mu ggwanga lino zizze ziraga nti abakuuma ddembe bakwata kisooka mu kulinyirira eddembe lya bannasi
Mu kwogerako ne bannamawulire ku kitebe kye kibiina mu Kampala, Muntu agamba nti yadde nga asaasira banansi ba Afghan, gavt ya Uganda erina okusosowaza ensonga yokukuuma eddembe ryobuntu nokukola ku biruma bannauganda nga bannakasese ababonabona na mataba.
Uganda esuubirwa okubudamya bannansi ba Afghanistan abasoba mu 2000.
Wabula gavt egamba nti tewali munwe gwannusu gwegenda kusasanyiza ku bantu bano kuba America yakubawa buli kimu.

Abamu ku bantu be yafera kuliko Edith Nambiribwa. Kigambibwa nti mu mwezi July, 2019, yamuggyako ssente ezisukka mu1,000,000/- n'amulimba nti akola mu KCCA. Yamusuubiza okumufunira omulimu ogw'obuwandiisi kyokka kyamubuukako bwe yatuuka k
... 
ti Kiddu tebamumanyi.

...
uwa.

Kamoga yaddukira ku poliisi y'e Lubaga ne bakwata Kiddu ne bamugulako omusango gw'okukozesa obubi kkompyuta ku ssimu ye ku ffayiro nnamba SD:06/21/01/2020 era kati akuumirwa ku poliisi ya Old Kampala

Bino yabyogedde mu kwaniriza omwaka gwa 2023, mu maka ga Ssaababonesebwa wâ€™abasawo bâ€™ekinnansi, Kabona Kazibwe Lubanga e Ssesanga mu muluka gwâ€™e Masuliita mu disitulikiti yâ€™e Wakiso. Mudhungu agamba nti yeewuunya okulaba ngâ€™abasawo bâ€™ekinnansi balwanyisa gavument ngâ€™ate ebawadde emirembe nâ€™abalabula obuteenyigira mu byabufuzi kubanga tebigenda kubayamba

Gavumenti ya Uganda ne China batongoza technologiya agenda okuyamba kubantu mu district ye Kalungu nebitundu ebilinaanyewo okulakulana.
Bo abakulembeze be Kalungu baanirizza entekateeka yâ€™okubangula abatuuze mu tekinologiya wa kkompyuta ku bwererere.
Kino kigenderedwamu okubawa obukoddyo bwâ€™okutundira ebyâ€™amaguzi byabwe ku mitimbagano nâ€™okukolerako ebyâ€™enjawulo ebivaamu ensimbi.
Omuwabuzi wâ€™omukulembeze owokuntiko- Vincent Ssempijja ye yayanjudde Pulojekiti eno emanyiddwa nga The Huawei DigiTruc
... 
ga be bagenda okuganyulwa.
Bano bajja kuweebwa obukoddyo bwokweyambisa kkompyuta nâ€™essimu okulaga ebyâ€™amaguzi byabwe eri abaguzi mu nsi yonna.
Kino kijja kubasobozesa okuyingiza ensimbi ezeegasa kyokka yabakubirizza okukulembeza obuyonjo nâ€™omutindo.
Abalala kuliko ba makanika naddala abâ€™ebidduka byâ€™ensangi zino ebyetaaga kkompyuta okukanikibwa,abayiiya mu ngeri zonna ezâ€™ekiddugavu.
Era, ne banna katemba nabo baasabidwa okulaga kye basobola okuguza ensi beefunire ensimbi nga basinziira ku mitimba
...
rala ebyetaagisa nti egenda okwetoloola obunyomero bwa Kalungu bwonna,nga baakusomesa abantu 40 buli lunaku okumala ebbanga eritali ggere.
Abakulembeze okuli Ssentebe wa Disitulikiti eno Ahmed Nyombi Mukiibi, RDC Dr.Paddy Kayondo ne Frank Kajumbi owâ€™abavubuka, ku lwa banaabwe baasiimye entekateeka eno.
Baasimye Ssempijja okusakira ekitundu ne bakubiriza abatuuze okuyayanira entekateeka eno gye baagambye nti bagirinamu essuubi nti tegenda kuleka banna Kalungu kyekimu singa ekwatibwa bulungi.
END.

Oluwummula lukubye kkoodi ate nga luno lwe lusinga obuwanvu mu mwaka era ffenna twesunga abaana okudda awaka. Wabula obategekedde otya nga kw'otadde n'abo abasigala awaka okubakuuma nga balamu bulungi era nga basanyufu.
Omwana yenna okukula obulungi, alina okulya obulungi ate era n'okusula obulungi mu kifo ekisanyusa ate nga kiyonjo.

...

4. Obukuumi obumala
Omuzadde olina okufaayo okulaba ng'ekisenge ky'abaana tekiriimu bintu biteeka bulamu bwabwe mu buzibu.
Ebintu ebisala, ebifumita n'enirala eby'obulabe tobireka mu kisenge kyabwe. Lydia Nyesigomwe, omukugu mu by'abaana agamaba nti, ekisenge ky'abaana kiteekemu kkabada mwe batereka ebyokuzannyisa byabwe n'ebintu ebirala bye bakozesa.

Kazimba asinzidde mu kusaba kwa leero ku Ssande mu maka ge n'ategeeza nti Uganda ebadde n'abakulembeze ab'enjawulo wabula nga bonna bavaako wakati mu kuyiwa omusaayi ate nga bonna bafiiridde ku buwang'anguse kye yasabye kireme kuddamu kubaawo.
"Nsaba Katonda naffe Uganda tubeereko n'omukulembeze awummudde mu mirembe ate afuuke eyeebuuzibwako eri abazzeewo kuba abasinga ababadde bafuga eggwanga nga bavaako wakati mu kuyiwa omusaayi ogw'amaanyi," Kazimba bw'ategeezezza.
Mu bubaka bwe bweyesigamizaako emyaka 58 bukya Uganda efuna bwetwaze, Kazimba era asabye ebikolwa eby'ettemu ssaako n'enjawukana mu by'obufuzi naddala ezirabikidde mu kulonda abakwatira ebibiina bbendera bikomezebwe abantu basobole okubeera mu mirembe ng'eng'ombo n'oluyimba lw'eggwanga Uganda bwe biri.

MWE MUSUZA ABANTU KU TEBUUKYE MU KAWEMPE;
Omumyuuka wâ€™omwogezi wa
Uganda Police Force owa Kampala Metropolitan Police ASP Luke Owoyesigyire avuddeyo nategeeza nga Poliisi e Kawempe ekutte abantu 5 kubigambibwa nti babadde benyigira mu bubbi mu Kawempe nâ€™ebitundu ebirinaanyeewo. Abasirikale ba Poliisi ababadde balawuna ekyalo bebayimirizza emotoka ekika kya Passo Nnamba UBH 295F eyabadde evugibwa Michael Yiga, 28, nga Makanika. Ku dashboard yâ€™emotoka kwabaddeko enkofiira yâ€™eggye lya Uganda Peopleâ€™s Defence Forces â€“ UPDF era Yiga bweyabuuziddwa nategeeza nti yannannyini wâ€™emotoka eno.
Yiga yabatutte ewa Ronald Ssenyonjo nga yennanyini motoka eyategeezezza nti enkofiira si yiye wabula nti emotoka alina abamaggye babiri batera okupangisa emotoka eno nga kirabika bebagyerabiddemu. Ono yabatutte gyebali nga omu kubbo ye Kanyehamye Kakistone, agambibwa okudduka mu maggye ne Juma Kaya, nga ekyomukisa bombi babadde bagenze ku Poliisi yâ€™e Kanyanya okubaako gwebeyimirira nga kigambibwa nti yabbye akakadde kamu nâ€™essimu ekika kya Infinix.
Oluvannyuma kyazuuliddwa nti Kanyehamye ne Kaya, wamu negwebabadde bazze okweyimirira babba bonna era nebalagira bagenda baaze gyebasula.
Mukukebera ennyumba zaabwe abasirikale basanzeemu ebintu ebigambibwa okubeera ebibbe wamu nâ€™ebyambalo byâ€™amaggye.

Entiisa ebuutikidde abatuuze ku kyalo Kagoma mu ggombolola yâ€™e Nabweru mu Nansana Munusipaali oluvannyuma lwâ€™okusanga omuwala ngâ€™afiiridde mu kazigo mwâ€™abadde asula.
Afudde ye Grace Akello 22 ngâ€™abadde akola mu wooteeri e Kagoma.
Ono kigambibwa nti ekiro ekikeesezza leero yataddeko ebijjanjalo ne yeebaka, ngâ€™abatuuze bamusanze ku mulyango nga kiraga nti yabadde agezaako okwerwanako afulume kyokka nâ€™alemererwa.
Baasanze nga feesi yonna yayidde oluvannyuma lyâ€™okugwa mu sepiki yâ€™ebijjanjalo eyabadde ku sigiri.

Amawulire
BCU baakutondawo ebifo webakunganyiriza emwanyi
Bya Musasi Waffe
Bugisu Cooperative Union (BCU) bakutnadika okutondawo ebifo, mu bitundu bye gwanga ebyenjawulo, webakunganyiza emwanyi.
Kino kigendereddwamu okwongera amaanyi mu mirimu gyabwe, nokutaasa abalimi ababaddde babbibwa ba kayungirizi.
Kino kyatukiddwako mu ttabameruka wekibiina kyonbwegassi kino, eyatudde mu Industrial City Division mu kibuga e Mbale.
Ebifo bino ziyite zi ofiisi zekibiina bagambye nti zigenda kutekebwa e Sironko valley, Bugusege, Lambuli, Upper Central, Lower Central, Bubulo, Manafwa, Tsutsu ne Lwakhakha.
Minisita webibiina byobwegassi, Fredrick Ngobi Gume, yateabye mu ttabameruka ono, era nalabula abanatu abaloopaloopa nga bawanaknay emirimu gyebiina, songa ssi ba memba nti bakikomye.
Agambye nti bano bandiba nga blina ebigendererwa ebyokugotaanya emirimu, wabula nasiima nokutendereza obukulmbeze bwa ssentebbe Nathan Nandala.

1 Pawulo ne Sirwano ne Timoseewo eri ekkanisa ey'Abasessaloniika eri mu Katonda Kitaffe ne Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo: ekisa kibeerenga gye muli n'emirembe.
2 Twebaza Katonda ku lwammwe mwenna ennaku zonna, nga tuboogerako mu kusaba kwaffe;
3 nga tujjukira bulijjo omulimu gwammwe ogw'okukkiriza, n'okufuba okw'okwagala, n'okugumiikiriza okw'essuubi lya Mukama waffe Yesu Kristo, mu maaso ga Katonda era Kitaffe;
4 nga tumanyi, ab'oluganda abaagalwa Katonda, okulondebwa kwammwe,
5 kubanga enjiri yaffe teyajja gye muli mu kigambo bugambo, wabula era ne mu maanyi, ne mu Mwoyo Omutukuvu, ne mu kutegeerera ddala okungi; nga bwe mumanyi bwe twali gye muli ku lwammwe.
6 Nammwe ne mutugoberera ffe ne Mukama waffe, bwe mwatoolera ekigambo mu kubonaabona okungi, n'essanyu ery'Omwoyo Omutukuvu;
7 mmwe n'okuba ne muba ekyokulabirako eri abakkiriza bonna mu Makedoni ne mu Akaya.
8 Kubanga gye muli ye yava eddoboozi ly'ekigambo kya Mukama waffe, si mu Makedoni ne mu Akaya yokka, naye mu buli kifo okukkiriza kwammwe eri Katonda kwabuna; bwe tutyo ne tutabaako kigambo kye twetaaga okwogera.
9 Kubanga bo bokka babuulira ebyaffe okuyingira kwaffe gye muli bwe kwali; era ne bwe mwakyukira Katonda okuleka ebifaananyi, okuweerezanga Katonda omulamu ow'amazima,
10 n'okulindiriranga Omwana we okuva mu ggulu, gwe yazuukiza mu bafu, Yesu, atulokola mu busungu obugenda okujja.

7 Ekitangaala kisanyusa, era kiba kirungi amaaso okulaba omusana.
8 Omuntu bwâ€™awangaala emyaka emingi, asaanidde agisanyukiremu gyonna.+ Naye akijjukire nti ennaku ezâ€™obuyinike ziyinza okuba ennyingi; byonna ebinajja butaliimu.+
9 Muvubuka, sanyuka ngâ€™okyali muto era omutima gwo gubeere musanyufu ngâ€™okyali muvubuka. Tambulira mu makubo gâ€™omutima gwo era genda amaaso go gye gakutwala; naye kimanye nti Katonda owâ€™amazima ajja kukusalira omusango olwâ€™ebyo byonna.+
10 Nâ€™olwekyo, omutima gwo guggyeemu ebintu ebikuteganya, era nâ€™omubiri gwo guggyeemu ebintu ebyâ€™akabi, kubanga obuto nâ€™obuvubuka butaliimu.+

Bya HUSSEIN BUKENYA
OBUWANGUZI Alex Isabirye, owa Victoria University bwe yatuuseeko oluvannyuma lw'okuwangula Vipers ku fayinolo ya Uganda Cup, bwasirisizza ebigambo by'abantu abamu ababadde bamuyita omutendesi ow'ekibogwe.
Mu makati ga sizoni eno Isabirye yagobwa mu URA nga bamulanga okugikonya, ne yeegatta ku Victoria University mwe yafuumuulidde bassita mukaaga abawagizi ne batandika okubisoma nga ne mu Victoria bw'atagenda kumalako, wabula yabeewuunyisizza ng'asitukidde mu Uganda Cup.
Mu myaka ena gy'amaze ku butendesi, awanguliddemu ebikopo bisatu, ekya liigi ne Uganda Cup bibiri (2). Vipers yeevuma ddiifiri.
Abakungu n'abazannyi ba Vipers beekokkola ddiifiri Dennis Batte gwe balumiriza okugabira Victoria peneti ng'obudde buweddeyo.
Maneja wa ttiimu eno, Lawrence Kato yagambye "Eddakiika 3 ezaayongeddwaamu mu kitundu zaabadde ziweddeyo.

Michael Kasadha, omwogezi wa Poliisi mu bitundu bye Busoga North, agambye nti Poliisi etandiise okunoonyereza ku nfa ya Galimu.

Bya Benjamin Jumbe,

Wabula ennyumba ez'okupangisa nnyingi mu bitundu eby'enjawulo naye kyandikubeerera ekizibu ggwe anoonya ennyumba y'okupangisa okufuna gy'oyagala. Kino kivuddeko babbulooka b'amayumba okugufuula omulimu nga kumpi buli kyalo kuliko ofi isi zaabwe.
James Luwagga omu ku babbukooka mu Bweyogerere annyonnyola obukodyo babbukooka abakyamu bwe bakozesa ne bafuna ssente mu bapangisa;
Babbulooka abamu bapaaza ebisale by'ennyumba ng'omupangisa bw'akkiriza banguwa mangu okutemya ku nnannyini nnyumba n'amusaba enjawulo ye oba okugigabana.
Okugeza ennyumba bw'ebeera ya 150,000/- , weekanga bbulooka ayongeddemu 50,000/- nga zino azikima ewa nnannyini nnyumba buli mwezi oba engeri endala yonna gye bakkaanyizza.
Babbulooka olw'okwagala ssente tebafaayo kuwabula mupangisa ebizibu ebibeera ku nnyumba oba ekitundu mweri. Okugeza bayinza okukusasuza ennyumba ng'ebyokwerinda byawo si birungi.
Abalala ennyumba ne bwe zibeera ziyingiramu amazzi mu biseera by'enkuba, babbulooka abalulunkana okufuna ensimbi tebakulabula era bangi bakifunamu kuba omupangisa bw'akizuula ayinza okusenguka olwo ate ng'alina kufuniramu mupangisa omulala.
Waliwo babbulooka abamu abakolagana n'ababbi ng'olumala okusenga wayitawo akaseera katono ne bakuyingirira.
Babbulooka abamu bapanga abantu abalala abeefuula bannannyini mayumba era bwe mukkaanya n'osasula toddamu kubalabako. Omupangisa yandifubyenga okwebuuza ku LC okumanya nnannyini nnyumba omutuufu n'amateeka agaziriko.

DAPHINE Kateregga 25, owâ€™e Kitende akola gwa kuyooyoota nsusu kwâ€™agatta nâ€™okufumba emmere. Yâ€™omu ku bawala bâ€™omu Kampala abafaayo okwerabirira mu mbeera...
SHANITA Nalika yâ€™omu ku bawala abatambula nâ€™omulembere. Yayogedde ne JOANITA NANGONZI nâ€™amubuulira ebintu ebyâ€™enjawulo byâ€™akola nâ€™alabika bulungi.
OMUSONO gwa wiivu ne wiigi eza langi gukutte bangi omubabiro. Gye buvuddeko, zaasibwanga bassereebu bokka era ngâ€™abakulaba ngâ€™osibye enviiri eza langi...
REMMY Nayiga 22, owâ€™e Makindye nga muyimbi muto ate nga mufumbi wa keeki yâ€™omu ku bawala gwe basinga okugeya mu kitundu olwendabika ye nâ€™okwemanya obulungi....
OMUNTU bwâ€™annyuka emirimu gyâ€™olunaku yandyagadde okuwummulira mu kifo ekisirifu obulungi asobole okuwummuza obwongo. Ekyennaku kino si bwe kiri mu bitundu...
Amanyi engeri yâ€™okutobeka engoye nâ€™ebintu ebirala byazambalirako nâ€™awooma. Yayogedde ne LAWRENCE MUKASA nâ€™amunnyonnyola ebintu ebyâ€™enjawulo ebimuyamba...
NDI muwala mutono era muddugavu. Neesiiga meekaapu agendera ku lususu lwange.
OMUKYALA bwâ€™agenda akula, olususu olwetoolodde amaaso oluusi luzigama, afuna enkanyana ne wansi wâ€™amaaso okuzimba (eye bugs) nâ€™atalabika bulungi. Era abakyala...

OMUVUBUKA abaserikale ba poliisi gwe baakuba amasasi mu magulu atandise okuvundira ku kitanda.
Ivan Bogere 32, owâ€™e Makindye ngâ€™abadde akola bwabbulooka mu katale ka St. Balikuddembe, abaserikale baamukuba amasasi bwe baamwekengera ne bamuyimiriza kyokka nâ€™asalawo okudduka.
Okukubwa amasasi, waliwo mukwano gwe eyamukubira essimu nâ€™abaako ebyuma byâ€™amusaba nga bino abaserikale baategeeza nti yali agenda kubyeyambisa kumenya mayumba gâ€™abantu. Bogere eyasangiddwa wabweru wa waadi ejjanjaba abamenyese amagumba, yategeezezza nti abasawo olwazudde nti avaamu ekivundu nâ€™ebiwuka, baamututte mu ssweeta alongoosebwe.
Yagambye nti, abaamukuba baaliko ekisaakaate kyâ€™omugagga omu kye bakuuma. Agamba nti baamuyimiriza nâ€™agaana ngâ€™alowooza babbi kyokka ne bamukuba amasasi. Ayongerako nti nga bamaze okumukuba amasasi, baamuggyako ensawo gye yali aweese ne bagyekebejja era bwe baasangamu ebyuma, omuserikale omu kwe kwongera nâ€™amukuba amasasi mu kugulu okulala ngâ€™ali ku ttaka.
Agamba nti abaserikale bano baali bambadde ebijaketi ebibikka yunifoomu zaabwe era teyasobola kwetegereza mannya gaabwe.
Abaserikale bano oluvannyuma baakubira bakama baabwe ne babategeeza nga bwe bagudde ku kibinja kyâ€™ababbi ne bakubako omu amasasi, abalala ne badduka. Poliisi ye yamutwala mu ddwaaliro e Mulago gyâ€™amaze wiiki bbiri ngâ€™ajjanjabwa mu waadi yâ€™amabenyese. Bogere awanjagidde abazirakisa okumudduukirira nâ€™obuyambi bwonna asobole okufuna obujjanjabi obulungi. Ali ku ssimu 0751611178.

KATIKKIRO wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asabye Gavumenti obutateeka bukwakkulizo bungi ku muyimbi omuto Patrick Senyonjo amanyiddwa nga Fresh Kid, wabula bafube kulaba nga bakulakulanya ekitone kye asobole okuba owâ€™omugaso eri e Ggwanga lye mu maaso.

Yabadde ku ssomero lya Pioneer Pulayimale elisangibwa e Nansana mu Wakiso ku mukolo kwe yayitibwa okukyalira ku bayizi oluvanyuma lwâ€™okumusaba agendeyo gye buvuddeko bwe baali baleese oluwalo lwabwe e Mengo.

Poland
Poland ni gavumenti ezonneddwa mu mukwano ku buganda obw'omu byayise okuliko mu Yoorooppa eri munsi, Emmalamu ne Czech Republic ne Slovakia eri nsi, Ukraine ne Belarus eri mugaso, ne Lithuania ne mu Russia eri mutima. Poland gy'eyawadde abantu abadda 38 milyoni, era era ziino nz'obwangu ne bwa Warsaw. Poland ni nnaku yâ€™ebiwereere ebifaanana ebisoboleeyo okuva ku bantu, era eno mweddeko oluvannyuma lwâ€™ebyakhaki okuva ku Africa mu mabere ga Yoorooppa. Ekimu ne bagobere okulwa ne bwereere ku
... 
 n'okusinga okujjamujjuli, ensimbi yawagala okuleeta olwekyo ng'ebigenda bikozesebwa mu maani a mwezi gw'okusatu nga guva buli kyayise. Mu muziro nga mawanga ga puli mutulemwa n'egeyaana 25-30 digiri eyonna Celsius (77-86 digiri eyonna Fahrenheit), n'okusinga okuva 30 digiri eyonna Celsius (86 digiri eyonna Fahrenheit) mu maani ago. Mu ggulu lino, mawanga ga Poland gitalina ebibamanyi era gimalaanyi mugende mubasiga. Eyinza obubaka ebwekutegeza ku musanyusa ogufuna ebifo oba emikolo eno.Ebyokuko
...
kino omusango guno kye kusinzi kabaka mu Buyinja, n'ayo Auschwitz-Birkenau Memorial ne Muyingira gwa UNESCO, akyali klaro okutesa okusiima ebyobulamu eby'Ekidube ku mubiri omu.
- Okwesoma ku kulembera kw'Ekibuga n'amatooke g'ensimbi eyo ku Nyanja ya Baltic, ekinene dagala kuno ekiseera nga kyeekubo omuliro ogwe ebiyitirivu ne mazzi rempolampola.
- Ebyo byonna bifuna wakati wakati bw'obuwumbi obungi mu Poland, nga ensonga eno ebisubira wabula bwona obungi n'emizannyo eyo kompula ku Nsi ejjuddeyo.

Ssaalongo akwatiddwa mu bubbi bwa bodaboda ne yeewozaako nti abadde ayiiyiiza balongo be
Christopher Kato 27, abeera mu Maganjo B nga muzimbi ye yakwatiddwa poliisi y'e Kasangati oluvannyuma lwa Bruce Nyesiga okumulumiriza okubba pikipiki ye nnamba UEL232M.
Nyesiga yategeezezza nti; nga February 13, 2019 Kato yagenda ku siteegi n'amusaba amuvuge amutwale e Nabuti alabe bannyina.
N'agamba nti yamulinda ne baddaayo bonna kubanga yalina ebintu bye bamusibiridde kyokka baali bakatuuka e Busukuma n'amutegeeza nga bw'aliko mukwano gwe gwayagala okuwa ku bintu.
Yayimirizza pikipiki asobole okuggyako ebintu era n'avaawo okugenda mu kaabuyonjo kyokka yagenda okudda nga Kato asimbula pikipiki era bwe yamubuuza gye yali agitwala n'amutegeeza nga bw'agenda ku â€˜Mobile Money' okuggyayo ssente.
Yamuleka n'agenda kyokka yakanda ku mulinda nga tamulaba era amassimu ge yamukubira nga tagakwatta.
Yaggulawo okusango ku fayiro nnamba SD: 29/14/02/2019 ne batandika okunoonya pikipiki okutuusa bwe baagizuula. Wabula Kato bwe yakwatiddwa yategeezezza nga bwe yabba pikipiki asobole okunoonyeza abalongo eky'okulya kubanga embeera yali emukalubiridde.

MU kaweefube w'okuyamba okutumbula ebitone n'okuddiza ku balabi baayo, Bukedde TV1 ereese empaka ezituumiddwa â€˜Yolesa ekitone' ezigendereddwamu okuwa Bannayuganda okwolesa ebitone ebyenjawulo bye balina ate bawangule ne ssente.
Ng'ayanjula enteekateeka eno mu lukung'aana lwa lwa bannamawulire olwatudde eggulo ku Hotel Africa, Moses Kasasa avunaanyizibwa ku biweerezebwa ku mpewo za Bukedde TV1 yategeezezza nti kino ekikoleddwa kigenda okuyamba Bannayuganda okufuna omukisa okulaga ebitone bye bali
... 
 June 15, 2019, Gulu- June 22,2019 ne Kampala June 29-30, 2019."
Omuwanguzi waakufuna obukadde 10. Kenneth Oduka avunaanyizibwa ku kutumbula Bukedde TV yategeezezza nti empaka zino ziwagiddwa aba Harris International abakukolera eky'okunywa kya Funtime so nga aba Kunta Production be bajja okukwata ebinaafulumizibwa. Nga banoonya abalina ebitone, abantu bataano be bagenda okusunsulwamu okuva e Jinja, Masaka ne Gulu ate mu Kampala abantu 15.
Bano oluvannyuma baakuvuganya balondeko abasatu abanaaba
...
ka zino.
Ng'ayogera ku mpaka zino, Namubiru yasoose kusiima Bukedde TV okuvaayo n'enteekateeka eno era yakubirizza abantu abalina ebitone okukozesa omukisa guno okubiraga kubanga Bukedde erabibwa ensi yonna.
Madrat ne Chiko baategezezza nti omuntu anaalabikira kuBukedde ng'ayolesa ekitone alina emikisa mungi okufuna abamuteekamu ssente. Bino bijja kulagibwa ku Bukedde TV 1 buli lunaku okuva ku ssaawa 12.45 akawungeezi okutuuka ku 1.00 ate ku Ssande okuva ku ssaawa 2.00 ez'ekiro okutuuka ku 3.00.

Leero bwâ€™osanga Hassan Kalyango nâ€™omuyita musomesa, akugamba nti musomesa wa kulunda na kulima kubanga ye okuva lwe yamaliriza okusoma, talinnyangako mu kibiina kusomesa baana wabula ye yafuuka mulunzi ate omulimi.
Kalyango yasoma busomesa naye olwâ€™embeera gye yali ayitamu, yasoma nga bwâ€™asuubula obuwunga bwa kasooli era nga muno mwe yafunanga ebisale byâ€™essomero.

...

Omuyimbi Mathias Walukagga alula. Ku Mmande, Walukagga yasiibye ku kitebe kya poliisi e Bukoto ekya Crime Intelligence ng'abuuzibwa akana n'akataano ku bigambibwa nti y'omu ku beenyigira n'okukunga abantu okwekalakaasa mu bwegugungo obwaliwo wiiki ewedde mu ggwanga poliisi bwe yali ekutte Bobi Wine.
Yabadde akunyizibwa Chris Ddamulira akulira ekitongole kino era oluvannyuma baamutadde kyokka nga bamutaddeko obukwakkulizo obukakali omubadde n'okumulabula obutaddamu kwenyigira mu bikolwa by'obumenyi bw'amateeka.
Baamutegeezezza nti okumutta adde awaka tekitegeeza nti talina musango wabula baakikoze okufuna obudde obumala okwongera okumunoonyerezaako era bajja kuddamu bamuyite.
Walukagga oluvudde e Bukoto asibidde mu maka ge e Maya ku luguudo lw'e Masaka gye tumusanze n'omu ku baana be era ono ategeezezza nti leero lwe lusoose okudda eka oluvannyuma lw'ennaku ssatu ng'aliira ku nsiko.
"Bwe baafulumya ekiwandiiko nti poliisi enoonya natya nnyo ne nsalawo okubaako we neekukuma. Bwe baayongedde ekiwandiiko ekirala nga bampadde nsalessale wa Mmande okweyanjula ku poliisi kwe kugendayo.
Ku bya ttiyaggaasi gwe baamukubira e Nalufenya: Walukagga agamba nti, â€˜'abasajja bankola ekintu ne bandeka nga ntaawa. Buli lwe nagezangako okutunula nga ndaba Abazungu abansala mu maaso era mu kiseera ekyo natandikirawo okufumintiiriza nga bwe nzijjukira abasajja nga Dr. Kizza Besigye ne Bobi Wine abazze bakubwa ttiyaggaasi olutatadde''. Okusinziira ku kye nawulidde, bano beetaaga okuwa ekitiibwa.

ABAKULIRA offiisi ya NRM national Chairman ONC e Mukono bakyaliddeko Ssentebe wa Bavubuka ba NRM mu Gombolola ye Kyampisi Kawuma Haruna nga ono mu kiseera kino alina ekilwadde ekimubala embiriizi.
Kawuma yalwala okugulu gye buvuddeko era ne kutandika okuvunda mpola mpola, nga mu kiseera kino ali ku ttaka.
Okusinziira ku maama we Faith Namuyiga yategezezza nti mutabani we obulwadde bwamukwata ne batasooka kulowooza nti kujja kusajjuka, wabula baagenda okulaba pkugulo kweyongera okuzimba ne kyaddirira kuvunda nga kati nâ€™okutambula takyasobola.
Akulira ONC mu Greater Mukono Margret Nakavubu saako ne baddukanya nabo emirimu ku lwâ€™okuna baakyaliddeko Kawuma mu maaka ga bazadde be agasangibwa ku kyalo Bunyiri mu gombolola ye Kyampisi e Mukono era ne bamuwa akakadde ke ssente (1,000.000) okuva mu offiisi ya Sentebe we Kibiina kya NRM e Kyambogo.
Nakavubu yagambye nti oluvanyuma lwâ€™okufuna amawulire nti Ssentebe ono mulwadde baategeeza akulira offiisi ya ONC Hajjat Hadijjah Namyalo eyabawadde sente omuvubuka waabwe asobole okujjanjabwa.
Yagambye nti bagenda kukwatagana ne Ssentebe wa bavubuka ba NRM e Mukono Mulamira Gashegu bongere okunoonya obuyambi obulala okusobola okulaba nga Kawuma ajjanjabibwa.
Kawuma yebazizza akulira ONC saako nâ€™omukulembeze we Ggwanga okumuddukirira, nagamba nti kati afunye esuubi lyokujjanjabwa awonere ddala.
Mu kiseera kino yetaaga ensimbi ezisoba mu bukadde 10 alongoosebwe okugulu.

Sayansi akakasiza nti omuntu yenna alina akawuka ka mukenenya nga tekalabika, kitegeeza nti taba mulamu kyokka wabula era aba tasobola kusiiga muntu mulala kawuka kano. Ekyo kyekitegeeza okuba nga tekalabika era nga tasiiga (Undetectable = Untransmittable).
Kino kinene nnyo mubyafaayo bya Mukenenya kubanga kiraga nti omuntu alina akawuka nga tekalabika talina kwelalikirira nti asobola okukasiiga eri abo beyegatta nabo. Okukolagana nâ€™abantu abalina akawuka yemu kungeri gyetuyinza okulaba nga tumalawo mukenenya nga bamira eddagala lyabwe buli lunaku okusobola okusigala nga balamu.
Ebisingawo bisange wano UequalsU.org oba ku Building Healthy Online Communities omanye obubaka agasingawo.

OMUZIBIZI wa Liverpool, Andrew Robertson awadde omuzibizi wa Celtic, Kieran Tierney amagezi asalewo mu butuufu bw'aba waakukyusa ttiimu.
Tierney amaze akaseera nga ttiimu okuli Arsenal ne Napoli nga zimutokota era nga zaagala kumukansa.
Robertson agamba nti Tierney muzannyi mulungi era asobola okuzannyira ttiimu yonna ennene.
"Tierney alina ekitone kyokka mmusuubira okusalawo obulungi afune ttiimu ennungi," Robertson bw'agamba ku muzannyi ono bwe bazannya ku ttiimu y'eggwanga eya Scotland.
Arsenal egambibwa okuba nti nneetegefu okusasula obukadde bwa pawundi 25, Celtic bw'esaba.
Napoli yabadde eyagala kukansa omuzannyi ono kyokka omutendesi waayo Carlo Ancelotti n'abisambajja ng'agamba nti alina abazannyi abalungi.
Omutendesi wa Arsenal, Unai Emery agamba nti alina okufuna omusika wa Nacho Monreal mu nnamba ssatu ng'akatale k'abazannyi kano tekannaggalawo nga August 8.
Arsenal eggulawo ne Newcastle ku bugenyi nga tennazzaako Burnley awaka.

Sipiika asabye Gavt okutondawo akakiiko akavunanyizibwa ku Misaala gyâ€™abakozi
Bya Prossy Kisakye,
Okuttibwa kwâ€™omuyindi, Uttam Bhandari, abadde akulira kampuni ewola ensimbi mu kibuga kampala kuleesewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu palamenti ku mbeera yâ€™obwâ€™obwongo bwantu, omusaala omutono nâ€™amagoba agasukkiridde ba mane lenda gebabinika abeewozi.
Sipiika wa palamenti Anita Among, asabye gavumenti okwanguyiriza okutondawo akakiiko akakola ku Misaala gya bakozi ba gavumenti wabula alabudde nti omusaala omutono omuntu gwafuna tegulina kwesigamwako kuzza musango.
Bino abyogedde akubiriza olutuula lwa leero, era asabye gavumenti okulungamya ku magoba mu katale okusobola okukendeeza ku kya bannansi okugibwako ensimbi ezisukiridde ku nsimbi ennewole.
Omubaka wâ€™essaza lyâ€™e Jonam, Emmanuel Ongiertho, yeebuuzizza lwaki omusirikale wa poliisi Ivan Wabwire yasalawo okwewola ebweru wa Sacco ya poliisi.
Omubaka wa Kalungu West County Joseph Ssewungu asabye gavumenti ngâ€™eyita mu minisitule yâ€™ensonga zâ€™omunda eyanjule ekiwandiiko ekikwata ku ttemu eribaddewo gye buvuddeko mu ggwanga okusobola okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu ngeri entuufu nâ€™okugonjoola ensonga.
Mungeri yâ€™emu omubaka wa Busiki County, Paul Akamba asabye wabeewo enkola enkakali eyâ€™okufuga emmundu.

Omuwandiisi owâ€™enkalakkalira mu Offiisi yâ€™ebyettaka Opio Henry Ogenyi avuddeyo nawandiikira CEO wa Buganda Land Board ku nsonga yâ€™ettaka erisangibwa ku Kyadondo Block 273, Plot 38 (Mailo Title) ne Kyadondo Block 273, Plots (23974, 23975, 23976 and 23977).
Mu bbaluwa ye gyeyawandiika nga 24-May-2022 yakyoleka lwatu nti okusinziira ku kunoonyereza nti ettaka eriri ku Plot 23974, 23975, 23976 ne 23977 liriraanye eriri mu plot 38 ngâ€™ettaka lino lyonna lisangibwa ku Block 273. Basalawo nti beerule ensalo wakati wa plot 23974, 23975, 23976 ne 23977 ne plot 38 ku Kyadondo Block 273.
Kinajjukirwa nti Omusuubuzi Hamis Kiggundu avuddeyo enfunda eziwera ngayagala beerule ensalo zino wabula nebavaayo nebategeeza nti alwanyisa Kabaka no Buganda okusinziira ku ye.
Ono agamba nti akyebuuza lwaki BLB ekyawakanya ekyokwerula ensalo okusobola okwawula ettaka lya Mayiro nerya Gavumenti.

Byatandise wiiki ewedde, Kenzo bwe yabadde e Kololo nâ€™ategeeza nti bwe yali akyabeera ewa Aziz, yamugoba mu nnyumba mwe yali amusuza nga talina kyâ€™amukoze kati yeewuunya ebyâ€™okumusasula byâ€™ayogerako.
Kenzo eyabadde ku Happy Boys e Busega ku Ssande yategeezezza nti talina buzibu na Aziz wabula amwewuunya mu kifo kyâ€™okumutuukirira mu buntu ate agenda amwogerera amafuukuule.
Yamujjukizza nti nga bwe yamwegobera bwe baali bakyayimba bombi mu ngeri yâ€™emu yamulinda dda olunaku lwâ€™alimuyita amwetondere olwâ€™okumugobera obwereere baddemu bakolagane wabula takikolanga.
Aziz agamba nti Kenzo yâ€™alina okumwetondera olwâ€™obutasiima bye yamukolera bwe yali atandika okuyimba nga Aziz amukubira ebidongo nâ€™okumusuza wabula nâ€™amuwaayiriza nga bwe yamugoba ngâ€™ate tamugobangako

Abasumba okuva mu bitundu by'eggwanga ebyenjawulo babanguddwa ku ngeri gye basobola okulung'amyamu ekisibo kya Kristo nga tuyingira omwaka 2021 ogw'okukuba obululu.
Enteekateeka ya Culture of Honor and Love Day ku mulundi giuno yayindidde Resort Hotel e Kasangati ku Lwokusatu ng'ewomeddwaamu omutwe omuteesiteesi Bishop Joel Kakembo ng'ono y'atwala amakanisa ga Mount Zion mu Uganda.
"Tuzze okubeera nga tuteekebwateebwa abasajja ba Katonda okulaba nga tukulembera ekisiibo kya Kristu omwaka ogujja 
... 
ungi ekkanisa okulaba ng'abantu basigala bakkakkamu nga tebagenda na jjengo lya bannabyabufuzi abamu babifiire namu," Bp. Kakembo bwe yannyonnyodde.
Yayongeddeko nti ebigenda mu maaso mu kadaala k'ebyobufuzi binakuwaza ekibawalirizza nga abasumba okubakagana n'eddimu ly'okusabira eggwanga okulaba ng'okulonda kubaawo mu mirembe ate ne muggwa mu mirembe.
"Bwe tulaba abantu abafa amasasi, abamu abakazi balina embuto ate ne babakuba ttiyagaassi ebyo nno bijja olw'okuba abantu bagezaako okulaba nti b
...
okutuuka mu bifo gye balina okukubira kampeyini. Kati tusaba Gavumenti ne Poliisi okuddirizaamu ku bukambwe bwayo ate ne tusaba n'abalonzi nabo baddirize ku ngeri gye bayuwawo omubiri," Bwa'tyo Bp. Kakembo bwe yayongeddeko.
Abamu ku boogezi abeetabye mu kusaba kuno kwabaddeko; Omutume Dr John Bunjo, Bp Edward Lubwama, Dr Robert Kamanda ne Dr Daniel Batambuze abaakuutidde abasumba abalala okubeera obumu ng'ekkanisa ya Kristo nga tuyingira 2021 mu maanyi n'okulung'amya obulungi ekisibo kya Kristu.

Abâ€™amaggye balongoosezza
Abajaasi mu maggye gâ€™eggwanga olwaleero balongoosezza eddwlairo ekkulu e Mulago ngâ€™egimu ku mikolo gyâ€™okukuza olunaku lwa Tarehe Sita
Olunaku luno olubaawo buli nga 6 omwezi ogwâ€™okubiri lukuzibwa okujjukira olunaku abaali abayekeera ba NRA lwebalumba enkambi yâ€™amaggye ge Kabamba.
Eggye lyâ€™eggwanga era liwerezza ne ba yingiya baalyo okuddabiriza abyâ€™amasanyalaze byonna ebyaafa
Yye ekulembeddemu bannamaggye bano nga ye Col Mugenyi ssabiiti agambye nti ono yoo mu kawefube waabwe owâ€™okuddiza abantu.
Yye omwogezi wâ€™eddwaliro lye Mulago, Enock Kusaasira agamba nti kino kyakuyamba okutereeza entambuza yâ€™emirimu mu ddwaliro lino.

E Bwindi eriyo eddwaliro, eryazimba ekisulo kyâ€™abakazi abâ€™embuto gyebajja nebalindirira okuzaala. Bagamba nti kino baakikola oluvanyuma lwâ€™okusanga nti abakyala bangi olwâ€™engeendo empaanvu bazalira waka.
Okusinziira ku kitongole kyâ€™ebyobulamu ekyâ€™ensiyona ki World Health Organisation, mu Uganda, abakyala abasoba mu 300 ku buli bakyala mitwaalo kumi abazaala, beebafiira mu lutalo luno.
Emu ku nsonga lwaki abakyala abasinga bafa kwekuba nti bazalira waka, mu mikono gyaba mulerwa, ssonga abalala bazaala nga tebalina abakwatiddeko.

Abatuuze baguddemu ensisi omwana owemyaka 8 bwafiiridde mu kidiba
Bya Gertrude Mutyaba,
Entiisa ebuutikidde abatuuze ku kyalo Lusaana e ssembabule omwana wa mwaka gumu ne kitundu bwagudde mu kidiba kyamazzi nâ€™afa.
Omwana afudde ategerekese nga Rihuwani Ssenfuma, muzukkulu wa Haruna Tushabe
Omwana ono okugwa mu kidiba kino abadde azanyira mu luggya okumpi nekidiba, wakati mu kwesika ne banne nâ€™agwaayo era tasimatuse.
Ssentebe wâ€™e kyalo kino Wilson Begayisa atubuulidde nti basobodde okujjayo omwana ono nga akyali mulamu, kyoka afudde anaatera okutuusibwa mu dwaliro
Ayogerera poliisi yeno Muhamad Nsubuga alabudde abatuuze okwewala okusima ebinya nga bino nebabireka nga si bibikeko

Gavumenti ng'eyita mu kitongole ekirondoola ssente n'enkozesa yaazo okuva mu banka ya Uganda enkulu yatadde envumbo ku ssente z'abasuubuzi (ze babadde batereka mu kibiina kya Dunamiscoin) olwa kye yayise okwekengera ebigendererwa kya kampuni eno okusinziira ku Godfrey Katongole akulira ekibiina kya KATA (ekigatta abasuubuzi b'akeedi ez'enjawulo mu Kampala).
Ssente zino okusinziira ku Katongole zibadde ziyamba abasuubuzi okufunamu amagoba buli ku nkomerero y'omwezi kyokka gye buvuddeko (ku ntandikwa ya December) abakungu ba banka enkulu batadde envumbo ku akawunti ya Dunamiscoin wamu n'okuggalira abakungu bayo mu buddukulu bwa poliisi olwa kye baayise okuva ku mulamwa gw'okuwola n'okuterekera abasubuzi ssente zabwe(ogwabaweesa layisinsi) ne badda mu kwaagala okuzizasaamu amagoba mungeri etategerekeka.
Era embeera eno yetabudde abasuubuzi ne bekalakaasa ekireeseewo akajagalalo mu kibuga wakati wamu n'okusanyalala kw'emirimu ekiwaliriza poliisi okubakubamu tiyagaasi n'amasasi okusobola okubaggumbulula.
Gye bigweredde nga n'abamu ku bakulembeze babwe okuli Katongole (abadde abakulembedemu akwaatiddwa naggalirwa ku poliisi ya paaka empya.

Julius Kisuule ow'oluganda yagambye nti William Nsereko (32) ye yafudde kyokka ng'okutambuza omulambo okugutwala e Mitalamaria mu disitulikiti y'e Mpigi tekyababeeredde kyangu.
Kisuule yagambye nti okusobola okufiibwako, baabadde balina okwetikka ssentebe waabwe ow'ekyalo ne bamuteeka ku kabangali okuli omulambo ne bagenda ku woofiisi ya RDC w'e Mukono Fred Bamwine okulaba nga bakolebwako mu bwangu.
Mwannyina Josephine Najjingo yagambye nti kikyamu okuba ng'oli afiiriddwa omuntu we ate n'abonaabona okufuna obusobozi okutwala omulambo okuguziika.
Ye ssentebe w'ekyalo Nassuuti Edmond Kiberu yagambye nti kyetaaagisa gavumenti ebeeko ky'ekolawo kuba RDC mu kiseera kino emirimu mingi gy'atasobola kutuukiriza ng'abantu abansinga bakaluubiriziddwa.
Kiberu yagambye nti abamu ku baakaaluubiriziddwa mu mbeera eno mwe muli n'abakyala b'embuto nga bamala ebiseera bingi ku woofiisi ya RDc nga tebayambiddwa ne balyoka babeer awo nga beenyoola ebisa bwe bibasimba.
Ne Winnie Nakitende omutuuze w'e Katosi naye yannyonnyodde obulumi bwe baayiseemu okulaba nga bafuna olukusa okunona omulambo gw'omwana mu ggwanika e Mulago gye yafiiridde.
Nakitedde yagambye nti olugendo luno baaalutandiseeko ssaawa 12:00 ku makya kyokka nga ne we zaaweredde ssaawa 7:30 mu ttuntu nga bakyali ku woofiisi ya RDC balinda.
Ye RDC Bamwine teyafunyise kubaako ky'ayogera oluvannyuma lw'okumala ebbanga ng'ali mu lukiiko n'abakulembeze abalala.
eby'enjawulo.

Nnamwandu wâ€™omusajja owâ€™emyaka amakumi 56 eyeetuze olwâ€™ebbanja eryâ€™emitwalo amakumi ataano ategeerekese nga Nyiraguhirwa Ancilla ,awakanyizza ebyogeddwa nti bba yeetuze lwakumulemesa kutunda katundu ku ppolotiye e Kisoro asasule ebbanja erimubadde mu bulago.
Omulambo gwa musajjamukulu Pereza Ponsiano abadde omutuuze ku kyalo Kabaya mu district eye Kisoro gusangiddwa gulengejjera ku muti gwa Woovakkedo emmanju wâ€™enjuuye nga Ssekamwa wa poliisi eruuyi eyo Elly Maate agamba nti musajjamukulu oyo yeeyambisizza katimba ka nsiri buno obwagabwa ne yeggya mu bulamu.Baliraanwa baabwe bategeezezza nti ono abadde nâ€™ebbanja lya ka SACCO akâ€™omu kitundu lya mitwalo ataano atenga mukyalawe amuganye okusala ku kafo kaabwe yeetaase.

Omubaka wa Kyaddondo East Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine avuddeyo ku byâ€™okulonda okwabadde e Hoima; â€œNdabye Bannakibiina kya National Resistance Movement â€“ NRM abatonotono nga bajaganya nga bwebawangudde kyanuku! Newuunya omuntu ali mu mbeera ze nga ategeera bulungi okuvaayo najaganya oluvannyuma lwebyabaddewo.
Omukulembeze oyinza otya okuvaayo nojaganya olwâ€™okunyaga Bannayuganda? Wadde nga mubadde temulina nsonyi nga mububba munzikiza, olwaleero Bannansi babadde babuufu nga buli ekigenda mu maaso bakikwata ku butambi. Kikwasa enyiike nga bannyinaffe ne baganda baffe abali mu byambalo bebakozesebwa okuggya ku Bannansi bannabwe obuyinza!
Bannayuganda banange, wadde nga twetegekera okuwakanya okubbibwa kwa mwanyinffe Nyakato (Forum for Democratic Change), tulina okufuba okulaba nti kino kikoma!

Gavt esabiddwa okuteekawo enkola ezinayamba mu kulwanyisa mukenenya
Bya Ndaye Moses,
Nga Uganda yetegeka okwegatta kunsi yonna okukuza olunaku lwâ€™okujukira abantu abaafa akawuka ka mukenenya, olumanyiddwa nga international Aids candlelight day, abali mu mulimu ogwokulwanyisa obulwadde bwa mukenenya basabye gavumenti okuteekawo eneyambako okulamawo akawuka kano wetunatukira 2030.
Shakirah Namwanje,okuva mu kitongole kya Uganda Network of Aids services organization (UNASO) agamba nti enkola za gavt mu kulwanyisa mukenenya za kuyambako nâ€™abantu abawangala nâ€™akawuka okufuna okuyambibwa okwenjawulo.
asabye wabeewo okukwatira awamu mu kulwanyisa mukenenya.

Amawulire
Besigye Alayidde nti Olwaleero lwerusembye okweyanjula mu kooti
Bya Ruth Andera
Munna FDC, eyawanika bendera yekibiina mu kulonda kwa bonna okwaggwa, Dr. Kiiza Besigye nate azeemu okulayira nga bwatagenda kudda mu kooti ye Nakawa gyeyewuubye olwemisango gyokulwa mu nsi ye olukwe egyamuggulwako.
Nolunnaku olwaleero omuwaabi wa gavumenti, Caroline Opia ategezezza nti poliisi ekyanonyerereza police ku misango gye.
Besigye oluwulidde bino nalangirira nti olwaleero lweriunnaku lwe olusembyeyo okweyanjula mu kooti eno, ento kale bwebanaaba bamwetaaze nga bamaze okunonyererza banamukwata.
Besigye yakwatibwa mu mwezi gwokutaano omwaka oguwedde, naggulwako omusango gwokulya mu nsi ye olukwe era natwalibwa ku alimanda e Luzira gyeyamala emyezi 2 olvanyuma naweebwa okweyimirirwa kwa bukadde 100 awoze ngava bweru wa komero okwali nobukwakulizo obulala.
Ono bamulanga kwerayiza ku bukulembeze bwe gwanga, oluvanyuma lwakululu ka bonna akaliwo omwaka oguwedde.
Kati omulamuzi we ddaala erisooka, mu kooti ye Nakawa nga yali mu mitambo gyomusango guno, Noah Sajjabi omusango agwongezaayo okutuuka ngennaku zomwezi 1st mugwomuwenda.

Radio CBS etongozza Enkuuka Tobongoota eya 2023 egenda okubeerawo nga 31 December, mu lubiri lwa Kabaka e Mengo.
Okuyingira mu nkuuka wakusasula shs 15000.
Ssentebbe wâ€™akakiko akateekateeka Enkuuka Tobongoota era nga yakulira ebyâ€™ensimbi ku CBS Chris Bajjabayira abadde ku mukolo gwâ€™okutongoza enkuuka, nâ€™agamba enkuuka yâ€™omulundi guno yakwetabwako abayimbi bonna nâ€™ebisanyusa njolo.
Enkuuka mwemubeera entikko ya Pulogulaamu Entanda ya Buganda eweerezebwa ku CBS 88.8 ngâ€™abantu baddamu ebibuuzo ku nsonnga ezâ€™enjawulo, nâ€™ekigendererwa ekyâ€™okutumbula Olulimi oluganda nâ€™obuwangwa bwa Buganda bwonna okutwalira awamu.
Omuwanguzi ye Muzira mubazira nâ€™akwasibwa ekyapya kyâ€™ettaka.
Omutegesi omukulu owe Enkuuka Tobongoota Abby Musinguzi amanyiddwa nga Abtex Promotions naye ategezezza nti ku mulundi guno balina ekyenjawulo kyebateegekedde banna Uganda mu nkuuka nga bakukisaabuukulula kwolwo olunaku lwa 31 December,2023 era asabye banna Uganda okujja mu bingi mu NKUUKA TOBONGOOTA
Enkuuka gwâ€™emukolo ogumalako omwaka Ssabasajja Kabaka gweyasiima okubeera nâ€™abantube okubayingiza omwaka omupya.
Ku mulundi guno enkuuka ewagiddwa MTN Uganda ,Samona ,BBS Terefayina ,Pepsi nabalala .
Bisakiddwa: Nakato Janefer

Bya Francis Ndugwa
Makindye
Olwa leero Kkooti yâ€™Amajje ejulirwamu e Makindye nga ekuliddwamu Omulamuzi Elly Turyabona esaliddeko eyali omuyima wa Bodaboda 2010 Abudallah Kitatta nâ€™omukuumi we Ngoobi Sowali ku kibonerezo.
Okusinziira ku nsala empya eya kkooti eno, bano kati bakusibwa emyaka esatu nâ€™emyezi mukaaga oluvanyuma lwâ€™okubatolerako ebbanga lye bamaze ku alimanda mu kifo kyâ€™emyaka 10 egyali gibawereddwa.
Omwaka oguwedde, kkooti yâ€™Amajje bano yabasiba emyaka 10 oluvanyuma lwâ€™okusingibwa omusango gwâ€™okusangibwa nâ€™emmundu mu ngeri emenya amateeka.
Munnamateeka wa Abudallah Kitatta, Abuddallah Kiwanuka yagambye nti ensala ya kkooti temusanyudde kubanga okuva ku ntandikwa tewali bujjulizi bulumiriza muntu we.
Kkooti bwebadde ewa ensala yaayo etegeezezza nti ekibonerezo ekyaweebwa Kitatta kyali kinene ate nga tewali bujjulizi okuva ku bapoliisi abakwata Kitatta.

Mu ganda ghanga alwa gho okulambala.
Nsituka mangu, kuba nga ndhi mubitirivu!
Nze aye yanhika mu kasana.
"Oli kyankyo kyange ekyo omunyenye," kateme ne yakoba.
Nali newulira bulirunaku, tye taga buyambi.
Ti fayo ku maadhi againhogoga, oba ku saabuni ayoza engoye.
Kateme andhidhusa, "Tiwerabira linho lyo."
Ndhiramu, "Mbe, ti nze!"
Ghe mara okwo oza, nhamusa dhaadha ni senga.
Mbendeza olunaku olulungi.
Gho neyambaza mwene. "Ndhi munene kati, Kateme," nakoba.
Nsobola okwingala gho amapesa gange ne engaito dhange okudhisiba.
Nfayo inho okubona nga muganda ghange ategera buli ekiba ku insomero.
Mu kibina nkola bulungi buli mu ngeri.
Nkola ebintu bino byona byona buli lunaku.
Aye kintu kyensinga kwendha, no okuzaaha no oku zaanha.

OMUTENDESI wa Arsenal, Unai Emery ali ku puleesa, y'okutunda abamu ku bassita baayo, ttiimu ereme kugenda mu loosi.
Arsenal, si yaakuzannya Champions League sizoni ejja era kigambibwa nti abakungu baayo baawadde Emery obukadde bwa pawundi 45 mw'aba yeetetenkanyiza mu kugula abazannyi mu katale kano akayinda. Kyokka kigambibwa nti erinayo ebbanja ly'obukadde bwa pawundi 50 ery'omusolo era abakungu ba ttiimu bagamba nti obutafiirizibwa, erina kutunda bassita abamu efune ku nsimbi.
Mu sizoni ya Arsene Wenger eyasemba ng'atendeka Arsenal, yatunda abazannyi okuli; Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain, Theo Walcott ne Olivier Giroud n'agula Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang ne Alexandre Lacazette kyokka ku luno eviiriddwaako Aaron Ramsey, Petr Cech ne Danny Welbeck wabula nga bo bagendedde ku bwereere.
Wano abamu we batandikidde okugamba omutendesi Emery atunde Mesut Ozil bamufunemu ensimbi kuba ne sizoni ewedde, abadde ayaka ku mipiira gimu na gimu. Ozil, y'asinga okusasulwa mu Arsenal ku pawundi 350,000 buli wiiki.

AMIRU Kinene ayimbuddwa oluvannyuma lw'emyaka ebiri mu kkomera e Luzira. Ono y'omu ku Basiraamu poliisi be yakwata nga kigambibwa nti emmotoka ze zaali zikozesebwa okutumbula ebikolwa by'obutujju.
Yasooka kuteekebwa mu kibinja ky'Abasiraamu abalala okwali; Hajjati Aisha Nakasibante naye oluvannyuma baamugatta ku kibinja kya Sheikh Muhammed Yunus Kamoga oludda lwa gavumenti oluwaabi ne lumuggulako omusango gw'obutujju, okutta Abasiraamu n'okutiisatiisa okutta kyokka nga August 22, 2017 kkooti n'e
... 
raamu banne era looya wa gavumenti Baine n'ategeeza nti balemeddwa okumuwa empapula ezimuyita kubanga bawulira nti ali mu kkomera.
Balooya be okwabadde; Fred Muwema baategeezezza kkooti nti Kinene talina musango naye nabo tebamanyi lwaki ab'e Luzira bakyamulemedde ekyawalirizza kkooti okulagira akulira Upper Prison (gye basibira abali ku misango gya nnaggomola) ajje annyonnyole ebikwata ku Kinene.
Moses Ssentalo yagambye kkooti ejulirwamu nti Kinene bamulina mu mateeka era yazze n'ebiwandiiko by
...
2, 2017 kkooti bwe yamwejjeereza emisango gino.
Twali tetusobola kumuta kubanga waliwo omusango omulala mu February 2015 ogw'okuyamba okutumbula ebikolwa by'obutujju ogwamuggulwako era okunoonyereza kwonna ne kuggwa n'aweerezebwa ne mu Kkooti Enkulu atandike okwewozaako. Ssentalo olwamaze okwogera, looya wa gavumenti Lillian Omara yasituse n'ategeeza kkooti nti kirabika waaliwo okubuzaabuzibwa mu fayiro.
Yagambye nti tebalina musango gwonna gwe balina ku Kinene era mu kkomera abaddeyo mu bukyamu

Afirika
Afirika ssemazinga. Afirika emanyiddwa nga olukalu lw'omwana w'omuddugavu. Esangibwamu amawanga agawerera ddala 54. Ssemazinga ono wanjawulo nnyo kubanga afumbekeddemu obugagga obw'omuttaka, embeera y'obudde ennungi, abantu abalina empisa n'obuntubulamu, ebisolo eby'omunsiko n'ebinyonyi ebisinga ebitasangibwa ku ssemazinga ndala. Ku lukalu luno kwe kusangibwa omugga ogusinga obuwanvu mu nsi yonna oguyitibwa Kiyira, n'ennyanja ekwata eky'okubiri mu nsi yonna mu bwaguuga eya Nnalubaale Sse
... 
a ag'obukiika ddyo galina ebyafaayo ebyenkukunala ebimaze emyaka egisukka mu nkumi ebbiri. Okugeza amasiro g'abassekabaka b'eMisiri abaayitibwanga ba faraawo gakyaliyo na kaakano. Omugga kiyira gumanyiddwa nnyo mu byafaayo era nga ne mu bayibuli gwogerwako. Tujjukira nti jjajjaffe Yiburayimu yawanngangukirako mu Afirika muno ate era ssemazinga ziri bbiri zokka Yezu omwana wa Katonda ze yalinnyako nga emu ku zzo ye Afirika. Anti tujjukira nti nga kabaka Kerode bwe yali ayagala okutta omwana oyo, 
...
kw'abantu ku lukalu luno mu mirembe egy'edda ennyo. Era Afirika yeesinga okuba n'eddungu eddene erikira gonna munsi yonna erya Sahara. Eddungu lino olw'okuba eddene lityo, tewali yeetambaalanga kulisomoka, kubanga buli eyagezangako, yafanga nga tannatuuka gy'alaga. N'olwekyo ebitundu ebiri mu bukiika kkono bw'eddungu lino byasigala nga byeyawudde nnyo ku nsi yonna era tewali yalowooza nti eno eriyo abantu okutuusa abatambuze abeetooloola ensi bwe baazula ebitundu bino nga bayitira ku ssemayanja.

Abalwanirizi bâ€™eddembe batukiza omulanga nga bawakanya ekibonerezo kya Kalabba
Bya Damali Mukhaye,
Nga amawanga gateekateeka okukuza olunaku lwâ€™ensi yonna oluwakanya ekibonerezo ekyokuwanika abantu kukalabba, abalwanirizi wâ€™eddembe lyâ€™obuntu okuva mu buvanjuba bwa Afrika basabye ebibonerezo byâ€™okufa bigibwewo mu mawanga gyebikyakola
Bwabadde ayogera mu lukiiko lwâ€™omukago gwa East Africa ogulwanyisa ekibonerezo kyâ€™okufa, Dr Livingstone Ssewanyana, akulira ekibiina kyobwannakyewa ki Foundation for Human Rights Initiative, agamba nti ebikolobero bikyali bingi mu mawanga agakuuma ekibonerezo kyâ€™okufa.
Agamba nti ekigendererwa ekikulu ekyâ€™ekibonerezo kyâ€™okufa kyali kya kuziyiza misango gya kufa mu mawanga, kyokka etteeka terikola kigendererwa kyalyo, nâ€™olwekyo lirina okuggyibwawo.
Asabye ebibonerezo ebirala biweebwe abantu abaziza egyannagomola okusinga okubawanika ku kalabba.
Okusinziira ku Ssewanyana, Uganda erina abantu 124 abakyali ku kibonerezo kyâ€™okufa nga balindirira kuttibwa.
Ate ye Dayirekita akulira ebyokunonyereza mu kakiiko ka Kenya National Commission for human rights, Anne Okutoyi, agamba nti abantu 600 e Kenya baweebwa ekibonerezo kyâ€™okufa kyokka nabuli kati tebamanyi ddi webagenda okuttibwa.
Ate mu Democratic republic of Congo, abantu 380 baasalibbwa ekibonerezo kyâ€™okufa, ate Tanzania yalina abantu 200 abasonyiyibwa eyali pulezidenti.
